nodes.text: The Estipona Party Squad was a group of cannibals active at the time of the Cold War. After landing on the ghost moon Kufs, J-Squadron members Dec Hansen and Sari Nadle wondered if the approaching droids were from the group.
Estipona Party Squad was first mentioned in the 2017 young adult novel Join the Resistance: Escape from Vodran, written by Ben Acker and Ben Blacker.
